record.title: MAKING FURTHER CONTINUING APPROPRIATIONS FOR THE FISCAL YEAR 2007--CONTINUED
record.chair: Under the previous order, all pending amendments on H.J. Res. 20 are withdrawn.
record.narrative: The clerk will read the resolution for a third time.
record.chair: The question is, Shall the joint resolution pass?

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask for the yeas and nays.

record.chair: Is there a sufficient second? There is a sufficient second.
record.narrative: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: I announce that the Senator from Delaware (Mr. BIDEN), the Senator from Hawaii (Mr. INOUYE), and the Senator from South Dakota (Mr. JOHNSON) are necessarily absent.
The following Senator was necessarily absent: the Senator from Wyoming (Mr. THOMAS).

record.chair: Are there any other Senators in the Chamber desiring to vote?
record.narrative: The result was announced--yeas 81, nays 15, as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I move to reconsider the vote, and I move to lay that motion on the table.

record.narrative: The motion to lay on the table was agreed to.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, may I inquire as to the pending business?

record.chair: There is currently no pending business.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to speak as in morning business.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
